name: Th777e Dr777agon Que777n
description:
A horrible rendition of The Dragon Queen for GBTK 7. Hey, it's not my fault that libGDX 19 and GTK7 were scheduled at the same time.

To truly appreciate this game in its artistic form, it must be played on the desktop. Download the latest java in order to play.

Thanks go to Tommy Ettinger and Jake Stevens for the modifications!
